NK080(wu)028:0: rdo rje dpal chen khro rgyal phyag brnyan ni //
NK080(wu)028:1: thugs rje thabs mkhas ye shes sprul pa dang //
NK080(wu)028:2: rang rgyud dag pas rnal 'byor grub pa can //
NK080(wu)028:3: rdo rje 'du 'bral ma lus dgongs su gsol //
NK080(wu)028:4: kun tu bzang po rdo rje 'dzin pa yi //
NK080(wu)028:5: snying la gnas pa'i dam tshig byin brlabs pa //
NK080(wu)028:6: theg chen khyed kyis dang du blangs ba dang //
NK080(wu)028:7: zhal 'ches gang lags rjes su dgongs par mdzod //
NK080(wu)028:8: bdag gi mig la sogs pa'i dbang po rnams //
NK080(wu)028:9: bem po'i rang bzhin rnam shes ma sbyangs pas //
NK080(wu)028:10: khyed kyi sku gsung ma mthong ma thos ste //
NK080(wu)028:11: mun pa'i tshogs dang 'dra ba mchis mod kyang //
NK080(wu)028:12: 'od kyang yid ches sems kyis rtse gcig tu //
NK080(wu)028:13: mngon sum mthong ba bzhin du rjes dran nas //
NK080(wu)028:14: dus gsum kun tu ma bsgribs mkhyen pa yi //
NK080(wu)028:15: rnal 'byor lcam dral bdag la rtag tu gzigs //
NK080(wu)028:16: bdag ni rdo rje dam tshig mchog gsum po //
NK080(wu)028:17: khyed kyi thugs dam mchog kyang de lags na //
NK080(wu)028:18: rigs mi mthun yang dam tshig srog gis bsdus //
NK080(wu)028:19: lcam dral tshul du nye zhing gdung bar dgongs //
NK080(wu)028:20: ye shes mngon shes ldan zhing thugs brtse ba'i //
NK080(wu)028:21: rdzu 'phrul rmad 'byung phab pa'i dgongs pa can //
NK080(wu)028:22: gzhan gyis ma bcos nyid kyis zhal 'ches pas //
NK080(wu)028:23: bden pa'i gsung la rtag tu grogs mdzod cig /gang dag byang chub sems dang ldan pa dang //
NK080(wu)028:24: sku gsung rnal 'byor brtson pa rnams la ni //
NK080(wu)028:25: kun nas bsrung zhing re ba bskong ngo zhes //
NK080(wu)028:26: khyer kyi thugs dam mchog kyang de yin na //
NK080(wu)028:27: bdag la bla med byang chub sems mchis shing //
NK080(wu)028:28: sku gsung rnal 'byor brtson par bgyid lags kyis //
NK080(wu)028:29: rdo rje dam can ma lus rgya mtsho rnams //
NK080(wu)028:30: kun nas bsrung zhing re ba skong du gsol //
NK080(wu)028:31: sngon 'das dus na dam chos 'jig pa dang //
NK080(wu)028:32: zhe sdang gdug pa'i dgra bgegs gar byung yang //
NK080(wu)028:33: lhag par khyed kyi thugs dam der byung zhes //
NK080(wu)028:34: drag shul thabs kyi spyod pa ji bzhin par //
NK080(wu)028:35: da lta dus ngan dam chos 'jig la sogs //
NK080(wu)028:36: sdig pa'i 'bras bu smin par khyed kyis mkhyen //
NK080(wu)028:37: sngon gyi thugs rje chen pos rjes dgongs te //
NK080(wu)028:38: ji ltar 'tsham pa bzhin du phrin las mdzod //
NK080(wu)028:39: mi nus mthu dang mngon shes ma mchis kyang //
NK080(wu)028:40: dam tshig mchog phyir lus srog phangs pa med //
NK080(wu)028:41: skyes chen khyed kyi mthu dang ldan gyur pa //
NK080(wu)028:42: 'gro ba'i mgon skyabs cing phyir skul la bzhengs //
NK080(wu)028:43: 'da' dka' rdo rje dam tshig mchog bsrung bar //
NK080(wu)028:44: grub pas khyed dang bdag du 'dra bas na //
NK080(wu)028:45: chos srung 'gro don bdag gis mi gcog pa //
NK080(wu)028:46: byin rlabs mchog dang ldan par mdzad du gsol //
NK080(wu)028:47: theg chen rnal 'byor bskang bar zhal bzhes pa'i //
NK080(wu)028:48: dus dang tshod mkhyen mthu dang ldan bzhin du //
NK080(wu)028:49: skyes mchog khyed kyis btang snyoms mdzad na dka' //dang po'i zhal 'ches 'gal bar mi 'gyur ram //
NK080(wu)028:50: gang gis gang nyid de yis dam bcas pa'i //
NK080(wu)028:51: de yis de nyid don du gnyer 'os te //
NK080(wu)028:52: gzhan gyis bskul zhing gsol yang mi 'tshal te //
NK080(wu)028:53: nyid kyi thugs dam 'bras bu mchis par mdzod //
NK080(wu)028:54: srid pa las kyi dus la ma bab ces //
NK080(wu)028:55: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phrin las mi mdzad cing //
NK080(wu)028:56: thams cad kun du las kyi dbang btsan nas //
NK080(wu)028:57: thugs rje'i spyan gyis yod ye ci zhig bgyi //
NK080(wu)028:58: dbang phyug la sogs bgyid par khas 'ches dang //
NK080(wu)028:59: dngos por lta ba rnams kyis bgyid mi nus //
NK080(wu)028:60: khyed kyi sgyu ma'i tshogs la mnga' brnyed par //
NK080(wu)028:61: sgyu ma'i rang bzhin cir yang grub par mdzod //
NK080(wu)028:62: dam tshig 'das la sogs pa nyes pa gang //
NK080(wu)028:63: 'tshe ba 'di la bdag gis myong gyur pa //
NK080(wu)028:64: mchod sbyin 'gro don kun la rtogs par du //
NK080(wu)028:65: chos la dbang bsgyur khyed kyis bzlog tu gsol //
NK080(wu)028:66: gang dag chos mi 'gal bar spyod pa la //
NK080(wu)028:67: 'bad pa'i 'bras bu med par mi 'gyur zhing //
NK080(wu)028:68: shes rab snying rje thabs dang mi 'gal ba'i //
NK080(wu)028:69: re ba lta zhing smos ci 'tshal //
NK080(wu)028:70: theg chen spyod pa'i rnal 'byor lcam dral la //
NK080(wu)028:71: nyon mongs dman pa'i sems kyis mi gsol te //
NK080(wu)028:72: 'gro don byang chub sems kyi smros gsol ba //
NK080(wu)028:73: thugs dang 'gal bar gyur pa bzod par gsol /
NK080(wu)028:75: dpal chen khro rgyal yab yum gsan cing dgongs su gsol //
NK080(wu)028:76: khyed ni ye nas gdug pa 'jam mdzad lags //
NK080(wu)028:77: khyed kyi thugs dang 'gal ba'i las rnams ci bgyis pa //
NK080(wu)028:78: rngam brjid 'bar ba'i sku la bzod par gsol //
NK080(wu)028:79: ko ri la sogs ma mo gsan cing dgongs su gsol //
NK080(wu)028:80: khyed ni ye nas rgyud 'phel dbang sdud lags //
NK080(wu)028:81: khyed kyi thugs dang 'gal ba ci mches pa //
NK080(wu)028:82: gnas kyi ma mo'i sku la sing la sogs phra men las brgyad po //
NK080(wu)028:83: khyed ni ye nas za byed dbang sdud lags //
NK080(wu)028:84: khyed kyi thugs yul gyi phra men sku la rta
NK080(wu)028:85: gdong la sogs sgom khyed ni ye nas 'gugs 'dres
NK080(wu)028:86: pho nya lags // khyed kyi thugs dang sgo ma
NK080(wu)028:87: pho nya'i sku khro rgyal yab yum bcu po khyed
NK080(wu)028:88: ni ye nas bdud dpung 'joms mdzad lags //
NK080(wu)028:89: khyed kyi thugs dang 'gal 'gro ba'i don phyir rgyal
NK080(wu)028:90: bas gsungs pa'i bka' //theg pa'i nang nas yang rab
NK080(wu)028:91: bla na med // gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa'i nges don 'di //
NK080(wu)028:92: blo rab skal ba can gyi spyod pa'i rgyu //
NK080(wu)028:93: gsang sngags rgyud 'di yongs su bzung ba dang //
NK080(wu)028:94: yongs su spel phyir bstan pa srung ba dang //
NK080(wu)028:95: rnal 'byor sgrub pa rnam kyi grogs bya zhes //
NK080(wu)028:96: thugs dam zhal gyis bzhes pa'i mkha' 'gro ma //
NK080(wu)028:97: bdag dang rnal 'byor dbang phyug bsgrub pa'i phyir //
NK080(wu)028:98: dam tshig gnyen po nod pas khyed dang gcig /dam tshig dbang gis bsdus bas nye ba dang //
NK080(wu)028:99: mnyam pa'i don phyir bsdus nas dbyer med ni //
NK080(wu)028:100: bdag tu rtogs pa'i nga rgyal dbang snyems pas //
NK080(wu)028:101: mi mnyam khyad du gsod pa don dang 'gal //
NK080(wu)028:102: rdo rje spun bzhin grogs pas brtse ba dang //
NK080(wu)028:103: lcam dral tshul du nye zhing brtse bar mdzod //
NK080(wu)028:104: bdag gis khas blangs dam bca' tshun chad du //
NK080(wu)028:105: grub pa mngon du gyur pa ma mchis kyang //
NK080(wu)028:106: dam tshig mi gtong sangs rgyas sku mi bslu //
NK080(wu)028:107: mngon sum dran pas rtag tu khyed sems na //
NK080(wu)028:108: mkhyen gsal thugs kyi bdag la mi dgongs sam //
NK080(wu)028:109: sgrib med spyan gyis 'gro la mi gzigs sam //
NK080(wu)028:110: bdag dang srog med nges pa'i rnal 'byor zhig /zhal 'ches skyabs kyi dam par khyed bzhugs na //
NK080(wu)028:111: bdag lta duhkha gnod pas nyen pa la //
NK080(wu)028:112: phan pa'i stobs dang grogs shig mi mdzad dam //
NK080(wu)028:113: bde dang nguhkha chos dang sgra ma zhig /stobs dang dbang du gyur ba khyed la smra //
NK080(wu)028:114: sems can las 'phro btsan par bzhag na lta //
NK080(wu)028:115: thugs rje'i byin rlabs ci 'tshal don med rgyu //
NK080(wu)028:116: las ngan bag chags byang bar mdzad du gsol //
NK080(wu)028:117: bcol kyang mi dgongs smras kyang mi gsan na //
NK080(wu)028:118: dang po'i zhal 'ches don dang mi 'gal lam //
NK080(wu)028:119: nongs ba bshags kyang tshangs par mi stsol na //
NK080(wu)028:120: brtse sems thugs rje chung bar mi 'gyur ram //
NK080(wu)028:121: dam tshig bsrung bar kun gyis khas blangs dang //
NK080(wu)028:122: khyed la rtse gcig sgrub pa bdag las med //
NK080(wu)028:123: bdag gi dam tshig nyams pa bskang ba dang //
NK080(wu)028:124: gnod pa'i dgra bgegs bzlog cing zhi bar mdzod //
NK080(wu)028:125: lo ka 'dir yang yongs su bsrung ba dang //
NK080(wu)028:126: phyi ma'i go 'phangs thob pa'i grogs mdzod cig /
NK080(wu)028:127: 'jig rten 'di na dbang cher grags pa yang //
NK080(wu)028:128: khyer nyid lags te gong na gzhan ma mchis //
NK080(wu)028:129: so so'i bran ga yog mang po 'bum phrag kyang //
NK080(wu)028:130: dam tshig bsrung zhi nga 'khor rnams bskyong du gsol //
NK080(wu)028:131: bdag gi dam tshig nyams pa thams cad dang //
NK080(wu)028:132: nyams dang tshogs 'dres nyams pa bskang ba dang //
NK080(wu)028:133: bka' chad dmigs kyi ma nongs rjes dran 'gyod //
NK080(wu)028:135: bdag gis sgrib par gyur pa ci mchis pa //
NK080(wu)028:136: byang zhig dag par byin gyis brlab tu gsol //
NK080(wu)028:137: stobs dang gdeng du gyur pa ma mchis kyang //
NK080(wu)028:138: thub tu re nas thug thub dbang ched bgyis //
NK080(wu)028:139: mi 'tshams bzhin du dbang bskur gsang ba bshad //
NK080(wu)028:140: bdag gi sgrib par gyur cig thugs dang 'gal //
NK080(wu)028:141: nongs pa dran nas shes su nongs bgyis te //
NK080(wu)028:142: thugs rje thabs mkhas khyed la bzod par gsol //
NK080(wu)028:143: tshangs pa dbang dang dngos grub stsal du gsol /
NK080(wu)028:145: ye shes dbang phyug mkha' 'gro khro rgyal gtso //
NK080(wu)028:146: bde mchog gnyis med yum gyi dbyings su sbyar /
NK080(wu)028:147: bdag tu lta ba'i nga rgya 'joms mdzad pa'i //
NK080(wu)028:148: dpang gyur rdo rje dam can ma lus dgongs su gsol //
NK080(wu)028:149: ta na gnas mchog sgrol ba gnas ma stobs //
NK080(wu)028:150: g+ha na gnas mchog sbyor ba byed ma phebs //
NK080(wu)028:151: rgyal ba yab yum thugs dang ci 'gal ba //
NK080(wu)028:152: bzod par gsol lo tshangs par stsal du gsol //
NK080(wu)028:153: rmad du byung ba'i mchog pa tan g+han 'dir /
NK080(wu)028:154: khro rgyal yab yum thugs dam bskangs gyur cig /
NK080(wu)028:155: dpal chen khro rgyal yab yum thugs rje yis //
NK080(wu)028:156: rtse gcig sgrub pa po yi grogs gyis zhes //
NK080(wu)028:157: bar chad sdang ba'i dgra bgegs rdul du rlog /
NK080(wu)028:158: rdo rje mkha' 'gro dbang phyug ko ri'i tshogs //
NK080(wu)028:159: sed+ha la sogs phra men brgyad rnams dang //
NK080(wu)028:160: rta gdong la sogs 'bar ba'i khro mo bzhi //
NK080(wu)028:161: dpang gyur rdo rje dam can dgongs su gsol //
NK080(wu)028:162: sgom sgrub dus la g.yel bar gyur ba dang //
NK080(wu)028:163: sgrub ba po yi rdzas mchog pany+tsa a mri ta //
NK080(wu)028:164: dus drug mchod pa dus su ma bgyid //
NK080(wu)028:165: bzod par gsol lo tshangs bar stsal du gsol //
NK080(wu)028:166: byang chub sems dang pad+ma rak+tara bcas //
NK080(wu)028:167: dri che gu gum chu nyid bdud rtsi lda //
NK080(wu)028:168: gnyis med sbyar ba'i sman mchog a mri ta //
NK080(wu)028:169: rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i thugs dam bskang gyur cig /
NK080(wu)028:170: 'bar ba'i gnas mchog tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du //
NK080(wu)028:171: bdud dang srin po ma lus sgrol nas kyang //
NK080(wu)028:172: rtse gcig sgrub pa po la grogs bgyid ces //
NK080(wu)028:173: bar chad sdang ba'i dgra bgegs rdul du rlog /
NK080(wu)028:174: sha za mkha' 'gro dbang phyug nyi shu brgyad //
NK080(wu)028:175: srid gsum rgya mtsho dur khrod brgyad kyi yum //
NK080(wu)028:176: gtso bo mngon spyod ma bdun 'khor dang bcas //
NK080(wu)028:177: dpang gyur rdo rje dam can ma lus dgongs su gsol //
NK080(wu)028:178: mchod pa lo zla dus las g.yer ba dang //
NK080(wu)028:179: dur khrod rdzas dang lag char ma ldan te //
NK080(wu)028:180: sha chen snying dang khrag tu rab sbyar nas //
NK080(wu)028:181: b+han+d+ha'i snod du dmar chen bskyil ba'i sa //
NK080(wu)028:182: sha za mkha' 'gro'i thugs dam bskangs gyur cig /
NK080(wu)028:183: dpal chen he ru ka yi spyan sngar dam bcas nas //
NK080(wu)028:184: sus kyang ma bcos nyid kyi zhal 'ches te //
NK080(wu)028:185: rtse gcig sgrub pa po yi grogs bgyed bzhin //
NK080(wu)028:186: bar chad sdang ba'i dgra bgegs rdul du rlog /rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po 'khor srungs shig /
NK080(wu)028:188: bdag nyid chen mo la sogs ma mo'i tshogs //
NK080(wu)028:189: lha dang lha min phyogs bcu'i dam tshig can //
NK080(wu)028:190: dpang gyur rdo rje dam can ma lus dgongs su gsol //
NK080(wu)028:191: lta ba gdong du byas pas spyod pa rtsings pa dang //
NK080(wu)028:192: nya bzhi gso sbyong dus las g.yel ba dang //
NK080(wu)028:193: gnyid dbang rmongs pas phyi mchod ma bskangs pa //
NK080(wu)028:194: bzod par gsol lo tshangs par bstsal du gsol //
NK080(wu)028:195: dam tshig lhag ma'i kha chu 'od zer 'phro //
NK080(wu)028:196: kun tu bzang po'i mchod sprin a mri ta //
NK080(wu)028:197: sha khrag dmar gyi bdud rtsi bskyil ba 'di //
NK080(wu)028:198: las kyi mkha' 'gro'i thugs dam bskangs gyur cig /bod khams yongs su chol bur gyur mod kyi //
NK080(wu)028:199: bdag nyid lta ba dam las mi g.yel zhing //
NK080(wu)028:200: dpal chen bsgom zhing bsgrub la bdag brtson na //
NK080(wu)028:201: skyes mchog bdag gi las la ma g.yel cig /
NK080(wu)028:202: dur khrod klong dgu mkha' 'gro rnam bzhi tshogs //
NK080(wu)028:203: khams gsum 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal ci 'dra ba //
NK080(wu)028:204: byams mgon khyed kyi thugs rjes ga la bzod //
NK080(wu)028:205: dmyal tshogs me ltar 'bar ba zhi bar mdzod //
NK080(wu)028:206: dang po byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed de //
NK080(wu)028:207: 'da' dka' rdo rje'i dam tshig mchog gsum po //
NK080(wu)028:208: rgyal ba'i bka' bzhin 'da' bar mi bgyid kyang //
NK080(wu)028:209: gsang sngags 'chol pas dbye bsal dkas pa dang //
NK080(wu)028:210: mngon shes chung bas skyon can ma rig ste //
NK080(wu)028:211: nyams dang tshogs 'dres nyams pa skong ba rnams //
NK080(wu)028:212: rab gnong 'gyod pa'i sems kyis mthol zhing bshags //
NK080(wu)028:213: nyams pa rnams la chad pas ma bcad na //
NK080(wu)028:214: tshe 'di'i rkyen dang yun gyi sgrib gyur cing //
NK080(wu)028:215: mi g.yo byang chub sems la bdag bkod nas //
NK080(wu)028:216: phra men sprul pa tshogs kyis dbye bshags mdzad du gsol //
NK080(wu)028:217: ye shes mkha' 'gro'i bshags pa rdzogs so //
